attributes.action: Stop the transfer of Sunnybank Recreational fields to ALBION SPORTS
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned are concerned citizens who urge Bradford Council to reconsider their proposal of the community asset transfer and appreciate the importance of maintaining this green space for the communities of Bradford East, Leeds and Leeds West
attributes.background: Bradford Council are proposing to dispose of the playing fields on Sunny Bank Lane (BD3 7DG) & Bradford Rd Pudsey (A647 opposite Howdy’s) to Albion Sports (Football Club) via a Community Asset Transfer (CAT) who will build 4G stadiums, with flood lights, fencing 3 training pitches, a clubhouse etc

rejection.details:
